alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Brooks; Cook; Lanier; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 13 at 6:28PM EDT until June 13 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 281 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA GADSDEN JEFFERSON LEON LIBERTY MADISON WAKULLA IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA BAY CALHOUN HOLMES JACKSON WALTON WASHINGTON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BERRIEN BROOKS COOK LANIER LOWNDES THOMAS THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABE SPRINGS, ADEL, ALMA, ALPINE HEIGHTS, ARGYLE, BANNOCKBURN, BARKER STORE, BARNEYVILLE, BENNETT, BERRIEN CO A/P, BETHEL, BLOUNTSTOWN, BLUE SPRINGS, BONIFAY, BRADFORDVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, BROWNTOWN, CAIRO, CALLAWAY, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CASA BLANCO, CENTER RIDGE, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHERRY LAKE, CHIPLEY, CHIPLEY MUNICIPAL AIRPORT, CLARKSVILLE, CLUSTER SPRINGS, COBB CROSSROADS, COOK CO A/P, COTTLE, COURTHOUSE, CRYSTAL LAKE, DE FUNIAK SPRING AIRPORT, DE FUNIAK SPRINGS, DILLON, DILLS, DIXIE, DRIFTON, DURHAM, ECONFINA, EMPRESS, EUCHEEANNA, FESTUS, FIVE POINTS, FRINK, GRACEVILLE, GREGGS, GROOVERVILLE, HANSON, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HILLIARDVILLE, HOLMES COUNTY AIRPORT, HOPEWELL, JARROTT, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LACONTE, LAKELAND, LEONIA, LITTMAN, LOVETT, LYNN HAVEN, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MADISON, MALONE, MARIANNA, MARYSVILLE, MASSEE, METCALF, MONTICELLO, NANKIN, NASHVILLE, NEW HOPE, NIXON, ORANGE HILL, PANAMA CITY, PASCO, PINE VALLEY, PINETTA, POPLAR HEAD, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, QUITMAN, RICHTER CROSSROADS, SANTA CLARA, SCOTTS FERRY, SIMSVILLE, SNEADS, SOPCHOPPY, ST. MARKS, SWEETWATER, TALLAHASSEE, TEETERVILLE, THOMASVILLE, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WEBER, AND WETUMPKA.
